column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We arrived on-time (~1-2 minutes early for our reservation and checked in + checked our coats. We were directed to the waiting area where we sat for almost 10 minutes before a waiter came to offer us a drink menu. We then selected drinks
column2: but it took nearly another 10 minutes to get him back to take our drink order. Mind you
column3: this whole time we were watching our table... Clean and waiting for us... Not 2 minutes after placing our drink order
column4: The hostess then decided to seat us but before she did abruptly stopped and walked off to see if it would "even be possible" to transfer our drink order.
